records.summary: Shape shifting sighting hovering over my daughters house.
records.story: shape shifting sighting hovering over my daughters house. Driving four blocks to my daughters house i see the craft at helicopter heighth.  Lit up 3 in a row like the top of a stadium light.  Hovering then moves over four houses..hoveres, by then i had gotten closer almost to my daughters house who lives with her father.  The thred lights separated or moved over slightly shifting the dark shape changed.  It tilted to the right i could see the round dark shape of its bottom.  It was silent.  I dont know if it was a sound it made just then i guess i would say a short intensifying hum then it flew fast and i couldnt see where. It stayed low to the houses. It hovered over my daughters dads house. We asked him if he heard anything neither him nor my nine yr old son heard anything. It was some xfiles shit was my daughters opinion on what we saw. Best one i ever seen and so close i raced through stop signs to get near it.  Attaching only cell phone photo i could get while driving.

records.summary: Luminescent Egg Shaped Object in Sky on SW Flight
records.story: Luminescent Egg Shaped Object in Sky on SW Flight On March 26, 2016, my husband and I were flying on Southwest Flight 4124 departing from Sacramento, California to San Diego.  We left Sacramento at 1:50 pm to our final destination, Tucson, Arizona. I sat next to the window near the wing.  I was looking out the window to view the snow covered mountains below.  The pilot announced that we were approximately 8 miles up and flying at 39,000 feet.  It was approximately 2:25 pm, I noticed in the distance, a very long, thin, black plume of what appeared to be smoke in the relatively clear blue sky.  At first glance, I thought I was looking at black birds flying in formation.  I asked my husband to take a look and asked him what he thought it was.  He said he didn’t know.  I looked again and saw a brilliant, mirror-like chrome, egg shaped object with, seamless, smooth round edges.  It appeared close, possibly within 2500 feet of the plane but due to perspective differences it could have been much further away.  In comparison to the left wing of the plane, the object took up almost three fourths of the wing.  As it moved, the top of the egg shaped object became visible.  The top was a bright white with a luminosity similar to a ! welding arc.  The top area had an extremely bright white luminescence with what appeared to be white flames in the center portion. My husband looked at this and said he did not know what it was, but believed it was not a plane nor a rocket.  He further stated that it was way too close to the plane to be a launched rocket out of a military air base. After approximately 2 to 2.5 minutes, it then disappeared from view. No one else in the plane appeared to observe it, as many were preoccupied—with shades drawn, sleeping, reading, etc.  My husband later looked on the FAA (Federal Aviation Administration) site in the incident/accident report section and found no report of such an object or a rocket launch in the vicinity of our flight path.  A drawing of the object will be mailed to the PO Box listed on your internet site. My background is Nursing and Public Health.  My husband is a retired public school superintendent who teaches School Law and various graduate education courses.

records.summary: Object hovering and changing shapes.
records.story: Object hovering and changing shapes. While sitting at a light facing westbound Arden Avenue, I looked up at the white clouds and noticed a small object that was hovering and then slowly moving towards the southeast.  As I watch this object move I got my video recorder on my cell phone out and recorded this object moving after a while it would stay hovering and looked like it was changing shapes and then it would travel westbound again and then it went a vertical a little bit because I was in traffic I couldn't sit for very long in the driveways that I was blocking as I was filming this.  After I got home and reviewing the video frame by frame I noticed that there were several objects one a triangle and another is sphere.  Several objects went whizzing by that I did not see with my own eyes but on video you could see them going by much closer than the object that was in the sky.  These were not Birds because I did Capture One bird and it looked completely different which was much larger.

records.summary: 10 round red (like fire) lights flying in line traveling up then fading out of view.
records.story: 10 round red (like fire) lights flying in line traveling up then fading out of view. Around 8:34 pm we sighted a total of 10 round red UFOs flying in a straight line, one after another.  Except for a short break between the 3rd and 4th, and the 5th and 6th. They came from the east and travelled northwest. As they flew higher they faded out of view.  They all seemed to travel at the same speed except for the 5th one which came out later then the others and travelled faster. They were all a flaming red color like they were on fire, only brighter then fire. I took video but it just looks like white lights doesn't show red.

records.summary: Long-tail aircraft that curved up.
records.story: Long-tail aircraft that curved up. I was going into Walmart on Marconi in Sacramento at about 1330 to get groceries and i looked up above the building and i saw an aircraft i have never seen before.  The head looked like a triangular and then it had a long tail that curved up at the end.  The long tail reminded me of a scorpion tail and there was no way it could carry passengers so i ruled out a new craft associated with the airport.  The tail was extremely thin and white.  The triangular shaped part where there could have been a pilot was darker in color.  I saw it in plain daylight no clouds in sight.  It was on the lower side in the sky.  I stared at it, trying to remember the details and no one seemed bothered by it at all.

records.summary: two high speed, high altitude lights Sacramento California 9:15pm + 8-19-07.  ((NUFORC Note:  Space Shuttle and ISS?  PD))
records.story: two high speed, high altitude lights Sacramento California 9:15pm + 8-19-07 2 solid unblinking bright white lights, high altitude, high speed, traveling in a straight line one behind the other (1/4 mile + apart) heading approx SSW.  Lasting approx 1 1/2 minutes then fading away in unison at a point that I should easily have been able to see them still but was no longer able to.....the sky was totally clear, so nothing was blocking my view of where they should have been still...... Did anyone else see this????? ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous;  provides no contact information.  PD)) ((NUFORC Note:  Probably the ISS and Space Shuttle, which had undocked.  PD))

records.summary: Bright violet light covered in mist, when it stopped moving, the mist formed a perfect sphere around the light. ((anonymous report))
records.story: Bright Violet light covered in mist, when it stopped moving, the mist formed a perfect sphere around the light. I am going to be completely honest.  I was out at night collecting wood pallets, that's the reason I was up so early in the morning.  We ended up in front of a friends house to store the pallets away for the night.  As we were sitting around talking, I noticed a light through the trees.  So I stepped aside to get a better view. When I did get a clear view, I immediately knew exactly what I was looking at.  What I saw was a bright violet light with mist trailing behind it.  It was about the size of a semi truck and it was moving slowly.  So I had called my friend to come and look at it, and around the same time he had eyes on, it had stopped. When the UFO came to a halt, the mist that was trailing it suddenly surrounded the light like a sphere as if it were (For lack of a better term) a force field.  The light maybe 10 seconds after stopping shot away into the night sky like a meteor. I am very knowledgeable in aircraft, this wasn't man made in anyway.  I have actually seen other types of UFOs as well.  This one I am absolutely sure to be extraterrestrial, at the least!  One day I will catch one on camera.  Hopefully my drawings will help others somewhat visualize what I saw, or maybe prove me wrong. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD)) ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: I was sitting out side and looked to the west and saw a massive light in the sky it was red,blue and white it stayed in one place for 2
records.story: I was sitting out side and looked to the west and saw a massive light in the sky it was red, blue, and white it stayed in one place for 2 mins and dropped to the left and down just above the horizon and then lifted up again and stayed there for almost ten mins the went out of view ((ADDENDUM FROM SOURCE OF REPORT)) hello mr Davenport it was tonight.at 9:30 pm...sorry I was a bit shaken we I first saw it...thank you again  ((END ADDENDUM)) ((NUFORC Note:  We have corrected the time indicated above.  PD))

records.summary: Star-like object trailing plane, followed by silver-whitish gray pill object
records.story: Star-like object trailing plane, followed by silver-whitish gray pill object Around 11:35 AM, I went outside to get fresh air,  I looked up toward the west to look at the moon (which was barely visible) and I saw the first object gradually appear.  I started dim like a star then became brighter up to a 4.4, like Venus.  A few seconds after it came into view it started to swing from north to south then started to travel south, very slowly.  I called my mother to view what I was viewing, just to confirm what I was seeing and she saw the same thing too.  I told her to keep an eye on the object while I grab binoculars.   By the time I got back, my mother said it had faded away, I'm assuming it went back up into the atmosphere?  Then a commercial aircraft passed by and then we saw another star trailing the commercial craft - that one was blinking.  I brought up my binoculars to look at the plane and the blinking thing that was trailing it but it and the plane left my view because my house was obstructing my view.  However, in the area where we first ! spotted the blinking thing that was following craft I saw through the binoculars a silver-whitish gray pill.  It looked like it was tumbling to the east then froze, then glided west and then it tumbled up into the atmosphere where it faded away.

records.summary: Circular, bright,orange,neon,light. It looked as though it had a vapor trail behind it. It was going east bound then changed flight to
records.story: Circular, bright,orange,neon,light. It looked as though it had a vapor trail behind it.  It was going east bound then changed flight to go north bound.

records.summary: Fireball with trail similar to a comet seen navigating over roof tops of suburb of city.  ((NUFORC Note:  Space debris.  PD))
records.story: Fireball with trail similar to a comet seen navigating over roof tops of suburb of city While walking my dog I saw what looked liked an orange ball shaped light with a trail following of what looked like sparks.  The ball shaped object looked to be similar to a burning sparkler like the type kids light on the 4th of July.  The object was flying approximately 50-100 feet above ground and navigating between larger objects in the area.  At first glance it looked like a meteorite with the trail of sparks but it was too low and seemed to navigate around large standing trees, power lines, and two story homes.  I've seen other strange things around this area, but nothing quite like this.  I went to take a closer look to see if maybe it were a crashing plane or meteorite but there was nothing where it should have landed.  I first observed it through trees and assumed the trail of what I'm going to call sparks were just glare, but when it came into the clearing I saw that it was not.  There also seemed to be a dark residue in the sky in the objects flight path, but not smoke. No sound was heard from the object, just a visual observation.  I'm curious if anyone else has seen this object.  I've seen other lights that would hover and make figure 8 patterns in the air, which I tracked for miles while driving home where it settled over an old building and put on a show for 20-30 minutes before disappearing into thin air. This light looked like a police siren that would flash green for a while, then red, then blue, then purple and repeat in no discernible order.  I took a video of this but it somehow got deleted off my phone. When I had looked at this video I saw other strange lights that I didn't see when filming with my phone. This was approximately one year ago. I've seen other very similar lights but just dismiss them now because they are so common. I'm not sure what to make of what I've seen but it keeps getting stranger and stranger as time goes on. ((NUFORC Note:  Space debris.  PD))

records.summary: Three red orb-shaped objects, and parachute, over Sacramento.  ((anonymous report))
records.story: Three Red Orb Shaped Objects and Parachute over Sacramento We were on our back porch and in the sky were three red orbs, with no streaks or tails, traveling slowly from East to West.  They did not blink, nor was there any sound.  They each slowly faded out and once they were gone there was what appeared to be a parachute that drifted in the westerly direction, until it was out of sight. ((NUFORC Note:  Source of the report elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Small very bright light seen lowering down the sky.
records.story: Small very bright light seen lowering down the sky. First seen from living room window, older sibling brought attention to it as "super bright light".  It was brighter than any other star in the sky so we thought it was an electrical light.  We grabbed binoculars and noticed it looked like a dome or half circle.  We saw it at 8:00 pm and watched it until 8:45 pm, when it finally got too low to see beyond the buildings.  It was to the west of Sacramento CA.

records.summary: About 20 white circular lights that periodically turned red.  Caught some on camera doing a zig zag, then they ended up vanishing.
records.story: About 20 white circular lights that periodically turned red.  Caught some on camera doing a zig zag, then they ended up vanishing. Went outside on a clear night to see a bunch of moving white lights that were blinking red.   Was going to pass it off as a bunch of jets, or something, before they vanished while we were looking at them, my husband got a picture of some of them, in the picture two were in the middle of zigzaging and you can clearly see the red zigzag.   Also got video of them.   My father in law said one came close to an airplane then zagged around it, two other people saw this one.

records.summary: i witnessed a rectangle, very bright LED type light looking S/W and est. the distance of 8 miles.  It was huge.  The lights shut off.
records.story: i witnessed a rectangle, very bright LED type light looking S/W and est. the distance of 8 miles.  It was huge.  The lights shut off.  GONE I looked outside my bedroom window in the Arden-Arcade area of Sacramento County at 21:41, looking South West and observed a Red/Orange RECTANGLE, very, very bright LED type light or combination of many lights. I estimate the distance of six to eight miles away and the size of approximately 200 yards wide and 100 yards high.  It was huge!  It appeared to be about 1000 feet in elevation.  It hovered or floated around not moving too much, just up and down a little.  The lights went to bright blueish and shut off, then reappeared back into the bright Red, Orange light, very intense light projection. It drifted South across my sight, same distance and elevation, then shut off.  I videoed it with my tablet, but my tablet only recorded a bluish speck, but I was able to take a screenshot from the video at its most intelligible position.  I blew up the speck so you can almost make out the rectangle shape.  I could see it through my tablet as I was recording it and knew it wasn't recording the same brightness and color, but at least I was able to record its presence. This exact same event took place last year starting on May 13th, 2016, and continued most every night for a week and I also took phone video and pictures with my phone of that event(s). I will attempt to get a better video with my cellphone, although it is not a smart phone, it does record better than my tablet.  I used my tablet because it has way better screenshot and enhancement features.  I will send more reports as I witness them.

records.summary: I and friend see bright white greenish light to W, caught my attention towards W, observed it linger, then begin to head E.
records.story: Myself and friend see bright white greenish light to West caught my attention towards west, observed it linger, then begin to head east, seemed from this angle to be airplane as it seemed to mimic a absolute silent one, after a moment changed course headed north.  Many more appeared through out night seemingly lost.  Upon observation of u.f.o, I noticed what APPEARED TO BE A STAR, was moving at what appeared to be a "first time" driver getting used to the gas/brake then faded in and out and disappeared, standing there staring at the area where it "disappeared"   We immediately noticed ANOTHER STAR headed in another direction where it mimicked it's....duplicates actions, and another one would catch our attention, at times we would observe two u.f.o's displaying similar actions at a time, throughout the night until daylight faded away the last visible star.  Periodically one of the "airplane" objects would appear usually headed west/east, of approxamentally THIRTY to FORTY U.F.O's.   Throughout the night we observed, only one set of lights (accompanied with the sound) were familiar to us as a jet.... Our necks hurt.   NOTE: SEEMED AS THOUGH THE CONSTILATION URSA MAJOR A.K.A "BIG DIPPER" MAINTAINED A STEADY POSISTION LOOKING NORTH.

records.summary: Driving on 99 south through Sacramento around 9:30 pm, seen 2 orange round objects dancing/flying together.  Other cars slowed down.
records.story: Driving on 99 south through Sacramento around 9:30 pm seen 2 orange round objects dancing/flying together.  Other cars slowed down to look, too.

records.summary: Noticed 3 flying objects in the sky.  It was quite a distance between the 3 objects.  ((NUFORC Note:  Missile launch at 5:26 hrs. PD))
records.story: I got home at 8:05p.m.  After I proceeded to go inside the house, I noticed 3 Flying objects in the sky.  It was quite a distance between the 3 flying objects.  There wasn’t much sound emitting from them.  I tried to take pictures from my phone, but it wasn’t that clear at night.  It last for about 8 minutes. ((NUFORC Note:  Missile launch at 5:26 hrs. PD))

records.summary: There was an orange light flying in the sky that was changing direction very rapidly.
records.story: There was an orange light flying in the sky that was changing direction very rapidly. A friend of mine sent me a short video on Snapchat of an orange light that was flying around in the southern sky.  Looked at the video and walked outside to see if he was just trying to play a practical joke.  When I looked to the south I saw exactly the same thing he sent me, a bright orange light quickly changing directions and leaving streaks in the sky. The streaks last about four or five seconds.  One of my cats was outside at the time and was frantically trying to get inside as well as hissing at the object in the sky.  The object was flying and changing direction too quickly to be a plane, a helicopter, or a drone.  There was looked like a commercial airliner in the sky at the same time.

records.summary: Two very high altitude craft flying toward each other on collision course, then both stopped, hovered.
records.story: Two very high altitude craft flying toward each other on collision course, then both stopped, hovered. I saw two very high-altitude objects moving toward each other almost on a collision course.  The two objects stopped moving when they got close to each other.  Both objects hovered for several minutes.  One would flicker its lights, then the other would flicker.

records.summary: There were 3 very dim lights in a triangular pattern, with a dark silhouette of a triangle surrounding it, flying near the power lines.
records.story: Stepped outside for a cigarette.  Out of the corner of my eye,  I thought birds were flying.  I lit my cigarette and looked up.   There were 3 very dim lights in a triangular pattern, with a dark silhouette of a triangle surrounding it, flying near the power lines.   I followed it for about 20 ft, but it went too far.  No sound at all.  Not mistaken for birds, or drone, or anything that I can think of besides a craft.  It was about the size of a car.

records.summary: Dozens of bright orange circular lights.
records.story: Dozens of bright orange circular lights Just after 8:00pm Pacific time, I was walking to my car, when I noticed a bright stationary orange ball of light.  It stayed in one spot for approximately 30 seconds.   I ran inside to get my wife and kids.  They came out and were able to see the light briefly before it seemed to just disappear out of existence.  I just thought it was a little weird but nothing more.  I got into my car, went to grab some groceries about a mile from the house.   About 10 minutes after the original sighting, I was able to see an estimated 20-30 bright orange lights in the exact same area!  Almost in the shape of a flower petal, stretching maybe across 2 miles of sky.  I flew into the driveway honking.  My family ran out. Unfortunately, my wife and kids only saw the last 2 bright orange balls “blink”out of existence for about 10 seconds and then they were gone.   Within a minute there were 2 airplanes circling the area where we had seen the odd lights. We hopped in the car to get out of the suburb lights and chase what we saw.  They did not appear in any capacity again.  For the record I’m a huge skeptic when it comes to any type of UFO talk.  That being said I have no way to explain what we saw in the sky tonight.

records.summary: Unknown object in N. California sky.  ((NUFORC Note:  We suspect that the object was a "twinkling" star.  PD))((anonymous report))
records.story: Unknown object in Northern California sky It seemed to be a bright star in the distance but it was blinking what seemed to be at least three different colors.  It was stationary for st least 10 minutes before writing this, and is currently still in the sky while I type this. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Almost a yr. ago today, I was in my backyard stargazing at about 10 o'clock pm  when I noticed three circular bright orange   Round obj
records.story: Almost a year ago today I was in my backyard stargazing at about 10 o'clock pm, when I noticed three circular bright orange, round objects, traveling separately in the same direction that I estimate travel 300 miles in  less than one minute.   The three objects came to a dead stop, then shot out to the stars  about five times faster than what they were originally traveling and disappeared.   About two weeks later, I was laying on the back deck at about 1 o'clock am, when I was awoken to a extremely bright light, to the point where I had to shade my eyes from being burned.  The bright light lasted for about  30 seconds, then completely shut off.   The following day it felt as though I had severe sunburn  to my skin and my eyes were painful from what I had experienced.   There was nothing remotely  possible of duplicating this light on either my house or my neighbor's house.  To this very day I have told only a few people, and I still am baffled from what I have seen and experienced in both occasions. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date above is approximate.  PD)

records.summary: They flew over Sacramento City College before I viewed them and traveled north.
records.story: They flew over Sacramento City College before I viewed them and traveled north. I was outside a popular coffee shop next to Sacramento City College on Freeport Blvd.  I was enjoying a cigarette and admiring the stucco design above the shop.  All of a sudden, a large silver disc flew over my head directly above me at slow speed!  I was startled at the appearance so close to me.  Just as I had a complete view of the craft another appeared! Then another and a fourth!  They were in a diagonal formation from right to left, the first to the right and the rest to the left.  They were scorched on the surface from heat of entry to our atmosphere.  This gave them a light and dark silver appearance!  There was no sound, no lights, no spinning!  They were about 50 feet in diameter and about 12 feet apart!  I thought of jumping in my car to follow them, but I was worried about having an accident!  I was shaking all over and the streets have cars parked on both sides making it difficult to look up and drive.  I watched for several minutes until they were out of s!ight.  They moved at about running speed on the ground say 6 mph.  Called MUFON about six months later and made this same report.  No one in the coffee shop seemed to believe me.

records.summary: Bright, square white light, flared, then dissolved.  ((NUFORC Note:  Rocket launch???  PD))
records.story: Bright, square white light, flared, then dissolved. On this Sunday evening, I returned home about 8:20 p.m.  Above my house, looking south-to-southeast, I saw a bright white light, that appeared to be flaring upward.  This light sat stationary just above the roof of my house and appeared to change shape, as it slowly descended until the main portion of the light dissolved and flared out.  This bright light measured approximately one-half inch between thumb and index finger with arms extended.  The light sat between two planetary objects, which were also captured in my iPhone still image and video (attached in an email). The principal light source did not appear to be a craft of any sort.  But the high luminosity suggests it was something very unusual, especially as it flared and then dissolved in night sky, below my roof line.  Several minutes later, I walked around the corner, but could not spot it anywhere in the southern sky. (Thanks for all your work in this area over the years, Peter!)

records.summary: Hovering silent craft with diamond pattern lights
records.story: Hovering silent craft with diamond pattern lights It was around 10 P.M. @ night when my brother & I were sitting on top of the roof of the shed by the chicken coop.  House location close to I-80 & Madison Ave..  We were up on roof waiting for the raccoon that had been stealing the chicken eggs, when we saw this flying object appear above us & it stayed above us for aprrox. 10 min.  It was about 500 ft. above us just hovering.  It had four lights in a diamond pattern & made absolutely no sound.  That is what was so most memorable about it.  I thought at the time, maybe McClellan Air force was flying one of there aircraft.  It hovered over us for close to 10 minutes, then flew up & away.

records.summary: I saw what could be a blue green weather baloon which dispeered then about 15 white dots in the sky which come and go.
records.story: i was smoking a cigarette and saw what could be a blue green weather baloon which dispeered then about 15 white dots in the sky which would come and go. never have seen anything like it

records.summary: Green lightning.  ((anonymous report))
records.story: Green lightning Bright green orb of lightning first flashed above storm clouds then descended just below, and then shot northbound at same elevation, then flashed and went up.  No sounds other than storm. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: My husband went out front to smoke a cigarette at a little after 6am this  morning. When he came back inside he was saying something ab
records.story: My husband went out front to smoke a cigarette at a little after 6am this morning.  When he came back inside he was saying something about he doesn't know what this is that he had never seen it before then proceeded to show me a video.   I watched the video the.  Went out front to see if i could see it.  When I looked up i was surprised to see it.  It was just sitting there in the sky over Watt Ave.  It has the brightest white lights and they were in a line but horizontal.  It is super cold, so i went inside but checked on it at 6:28 and it was still there.

records.summary: Star not a star.
records.story: Star not a star. Watching tv when I heard a noise in the backyard. When I went to check it out I didn’t see anything. It was a cold night and the sky was lit with stars had no choice to admire the bright clear sky. Standing there for a couple of seconds I noticed what appeared to be a star, but it was moving slow and then it stopped. 10 seconds later a flashing red light was moving all around the object, going up,down,left,and right at a incredible speed. I got kinda spooked and couldn’t really figure out what I was looking at. Went inside to tell my gf who was sleeping, by the time she went to take a look it was gone.

records.summary: I got up a little after 5am to check my emails and check some things on my pc, went into the main room and let the dogs go out do thing
records.story: I got up a little after 5am to check my emails and check some things on my pc, went into the main room and let the dogs go out do thing outside.  After i did my pc work i went outside myself at or around 6am to relax, sitting in table and chair at my cover patio i looked to the southwest up to the sky and saw a ufo triangle shape with lights all along all sides and three lights on the bottom this was at a 55 degree angle for the time i was watching this ufo up 3 to 4 mins it NEVER moved  No sound and i told myself get your camera now and i did when i came back out it was gone dam i told myself.  The size compared to the moon where it is, this ufo was almost half the size of the moon.
